name: Peoples Technologies
tag_list: web-design, eshop-ecommerce, ebay-amazon-shop-design, banner-design, business-card-design, erp-development
overview:
Peoples Technologies is located in Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, INDIA.

Peoples Technologies is engaged in development & designing of web sites, eShops aka eCommerce, 3rd party integration, ERP, eBay/Amazon shops customization, Flash animations, JQuery & JavaScript works, CSS styling, HTML5, PHP & MySQL development. Dynamic and static ERRORs sorting.

Active in providing local business the website design and setup solution. Further moved on to have outsource work from USA, CANADA, AUSTRALIA, UK, KSA.

Wish to work for a company engaged in design & development as an outsource partner.

Thanks & Regards, Peoples Technologies
